column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We went for Valentine's day as it's my gf's favorite place and I have to say I was not disappointed. The waiter was great
column2: the ambiance was amazing and romantic
column3: the ribeye was great although way pricey. The bacon was out of this world
column4: if you haven't had it try it. Overall
column5: I'd say this place is great!
